class.name: velodyne_pointcloud/vhCloudNodelet
class.description: Aggregates points from multiple packets, publishing PointCloud2.

class.name: velodyne_pointcloud/vhRingColorsNodelet
class.description: Converts a Velodyne PointCloud2 to PointXYZRGB, assigning colors for visualization of the laser rings.

class.name: velodyne_pointcloud/vhTransformNodelet
class.description: Transforms packets into /odom frame, publishing multiple packets as PointCloud2.
